duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and ensure accuracy of store inventory through report analysis, audits, and communication with Store Management.
Support world class customer service and ensure a pleasant shopping experience for all customers.
Assist customers in making buying decisions, identifying needs, making product recommendations, and promoting loyalty programs.
Collect and distribute daily inventory reports, and resolve discrepancies with accurate record keeping.
Communicate problems, issues, and discrepancies with Store Management and perform other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent experience
